cont.entity_a: Initially worked well, but the combination discs began moving together, requiring each number to be held in place.
cont.entity_b: Advertised as having the same combination, but received with different combinations. One lock is difficult to open and requires force.

cont.entity_a: Design flaws make it unreliable and not durable for long-term use.
cont.entity_b: Locks are not durable for outdoor use; they failed after 8 weeks.

cont.entity_a: Lock is not suitable for outdoor use; it oxidizes and rusts quickly.
cont.entity_b: Locks are not durable for outdoor use; they failed after 8 weeks.

cont.entity_a: Instructions are misleading, and the resetting procedure is problematic.
Lock can be picked easily with a hairclip.
cont.entity_b: Locks are not secure; they can be easily bypassed.
Quality has declined compared to older models.

cont.entity_a: Design flaws make it unreliable and not durable for long-term use.
